phrases: I am broke right now, so that totally fits the bill!
It is not just up to you to decide!
Well, we need the dough, too, so why not?
This Velveno is an escaped convict
that Gray set out to catch a long time ago, is not he?
Although if I recall right, the reward at the time was 400,000 jewel!
He must have gotten valuable these past seven years...
Hey, I heard that Velveno guy is going to show up
at the Balsamico family's magical ball.
It is a ball that is held once every seven years and only wizards can attend.
I believe it is next Saturday.
Then let us go to the ball and capture Velveno!
If you are going to participate in a ball, you will have to practice dancing!
We will start with the basic steps.
Jeez, this is a pain in the ass...
What are Natsu-nii and Lucy-nee trying to do?
So it is a game where you step on each other's feet...
I do not think that is the aim...
Social dancing is where a man and woman pair up and dance at a ball.
That looks like a fun game!
Gray-sama is going to dance flirtatiously behind Juvia's back...?
If it means being able to dance with Gray-sama, Juvia will strip, too!
I was once known as the Dancing Demon,
so if you want to learn social dancing, leave it to me.
I am going to throw up!
Anybody who dances with Erza always gets sick to their stomach.
You can see why she was called the Dancing Demon.
I guess I will have to be the one who teaches Natsu how to dance.
No, I am going to take a little break...
How can an adult be that delicate?!
And you call yourself a Man?!
But why is she dancing with Warren?
Let us you and me try dancing, too!
Would you give me the honor of a dance, young lady?
Taking advantage of this chaos is playin' dirty!
Shut up and get outta the way!
Just so you know, I are not going to dance!
I guess I have no choice if you are going to be like that about it...
But, I did not say anything...
When it comes to dance, I am the master!
Visitar, your dances are something else entirely!
To be frank, you are just in the way here!
This has become a big fuss right under my nose...
But... somewhere along the line, I lost my partner!
You are really good at dancing.
As a member of the Heartfilia family,
you need to be raised as a proper lady, Lucy-sama.
But I think this is a little overkill...
Let us take it from the top once more.
And this is Balsamico Palace, home of the client.
So the magical ball's going to be held in this palace, huh?
It was farther away than I thought.
We are doing it for the dance!
You should not have tagged along if you are only doing it to dance!
May I ask who you people are?
There is no need to mentally shout that!
I am Aceto, daughter of Balsamico, lord of this palace.
That is a name you would probably bite your tongue saying!
I am Natsu of Fairy Tail!
We have accepted the request of your father, the Count.
In that case, I will show you in.
I am Count Balsamico, the client.
He is not only got a sour name...
Getting down to business, it is a little more complicated
than what I wrote in the request.
It is about the apple of my eye, my beautiful daughter...
Actually, my daughter's husband will be decided at this evening's magical ball.
For that purpose, I have got a ring that only comes out once every seven years.
It is a precious ring that the Balsamico family
has handed down from generation to generation.
Then Velveno has his eye on the ring?
In truth, Velveno went after the ring seven years ago, but failed.
As a result, though, the husband selection process was ruined.
But with a face like this, even disguised,
would not Velveno be easy to catch if he tried to sneak into the ball?
He uses Transformation Magic and Magical Drain.
It is a truly troublesome form of magic that let us him copy the magic powers
of whatever wizard he touches for a short period of time.
I want you to combine your powers and protect the ring from Velveno!
Then capture the scoundrel and send him back to prison!
We will not let you down, sir!
And just to make sure, if we catch Velveno,
you will follow through with what was written on the request form...
I will pay 4,000,000 jewel in cash.
Right when I need it the most!
What if I am so cute that somebody proposes to me?!
Why are you in serious mode?!
Work or not, this is the minimum amount of decorum due
But I am a little embarrassed...
The ball's curtain is going up!
We are getting up on stage, too!
Erza is into this as much as she was acting that time!
I will do my best, too!
But first I have to cast Troia on Natsu.
Warren, anyone here seem like they could be Velveno?
I used a surveillance lacrima to investigate the whole place,
but there is no sign of him at the moment.
We will let you know the second we spot a suspicious character!
Until then, try to act naturally.
Where are Natsu and the rest?
Lucy and the others are here, too.
Then why do not we blend in with the other guests and dance?
Still, is Velveno really going to show up at a glitzy place like this?
All we can do is look for a suspicious guy without ruffling any feathers...
C'mon, cut the rug with me!
Some suspicious guy just invited Erza to dance!
You do not have enough spirit!
Now someone asked Lucy to dance!
Since you will not take no for an answer...
This is what a Man is!
I am so happy I was born a Man!
It is fishy for a beautiful woman like that to go up to Elfman!
If she is Velveno, she probably intends to drain Elfman's Beast Soul power!
The woman who asked Elfman to dance is suspect!
When you are in love, the bigger the obstacle, the more fired up you become!
You are a pretty nice-looking guy yourself.
Being a guest here at the magical ball must mean you are a wizard, too, right?
What kind of magic can you use?
Before asking a lady about magic,
it is proper for a gentleman to say what kind of magic he does first.
Unfortunately, I have no interest in being a gentleman.
In that case, I will show you mine first.
She uses the same kind of Ice Make Magic that I use?
I love when it gets intense like this!
It looks like things have gotten out of hand, as usual...
Aceto, it seems that you are so beautiful, no one dares ask you for a dance.
Your dazzling beauty is too Manly!
Who the hell is that little kid?!
He is way too young for her!
The ball's over at midnight and it is nearly that time.
That giant grandfather's clock only opens once every seven years,
releasing a device that displays the ring.
And following Balsamico family tradition, whatever man
can obtain the ring from there has the right to propose to my daughter!
The man who gets the ring...?
Those of you men who would propose to my daughter, go for that ring!
If you are a Man, propose!
What would you even do if you proposed?!
The boy Wendy was dancing with!
A guy with an afro grabbed me right before I came in!
Then the person who is with Wendy is...
You have all witnessed me, Velveno, taking the Balsamico ring!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
While we were all dancing, I drained your power, too!
I have already copied the magic of every member of Fairy Tail here!
I have always wanted to throw down with a copycat,
just to see how far he can take it!
I did not come here tonight to brawl with you guys.
I failed last time, but have waited patiently these seven years...
We have been chums ever since we were kids,
but I have always been madly in love with you!
I allowed you, the son of a servant, to be my daughter's playmate!
Ever since you drove me out of the mansion, I came back again and again
to visit Aceto, but every time, you used the difference in our social positions
as an excuse to turn me away at the gate!
Papa, I never heard about that!
For a while, I accepted your reasoning and gave up on Aceto.
But because of that, my heart grew wild, I got involved in crime,
and before I knew it, ended up in prison!
What is he going on about?!
But every minute I was in jail, I regretted not letting you know how I felt!
That is why I broke out, so I could take this chance
that only comes around once every seven years!
And this is the second time for it!
Velveno, I have been waiting all this time for you, too!
You will really become my wife?!
You will have to turn yourself in and pay for your crimes first.
It is like a fairy tale!
I do not know about this...
Let us wish these two luck with a round of applause!
I swear that I will wait for you...
And I swear I will come back for you.
There is no way I am going to pay it!
I say we dance the rest of the night away
What a way for it to turn out...
I hope someone proposes to me like that someday!
I ate so much I am bloated, so I am going home!
Come on, do not be like that!
Hang out a little longer with me!
Jeez, when are you going to get used to transportation, Natsu?
That is why I warned against this!
You knew this job would involve having to get on some transportation, right?
It looks like the whole world is spinning!
It is not the world that is spinning, Natsu, it is your eyes!
Next time: The Truly Evil Jiggle Butt Gang!
